headline: Did Yum!'s Pizza Hut Review and Solo-Dining Push Just Shift Yum! Brands' (YUM) Investment Narrative?
summary: Earlier this week, Yum! Brands confirmed it is reviewing strategic options for its Pizza Hut division, including a possible spin-off or sale that could raise an estimated US$2.40–US$3.50 billion to redeploy into its core KFC and Taco Bell businesses. At the same time, Yum! Brands released its first public 2026 Food Trends Report, underscoring how rising solo dining and demand for customization are directly informing menu design and digital ordering across its restaurant portfolio. We’ll now...
